mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, avatar = #{avatar}, state = #{state}, createTime = #{createTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, delFlag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_user SET delFlag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE delFlag = 0 AND id = #{id}
